name: chica-chica-api
description: Chat app backend with Express and Socket.io

scripts.build: npm run copy:terminal-client && npm run build:backend && npm run build:terminal-client
scripts.copy:terminal-client: if [ ! -d terminal-client ]; then cp -r ../terminal-client . 2>/dev/null || true; fi
scripts.build:terminal-client: if [ -d terminal-client ]; then cd terminal-client && npm install && npm run build; fi
